Summary._: R trains are stopping along the Q line between Canal St and DeKalb Av in both directions because of a NYPD investigation at Jay St-MetoTech.

Description._:
There is no [R] train service between City Hall and Jay St-MetroTech in both directions. 

[R] trains are stopping along the [Q] line between Canal St and DeKalb Av in both directions.

These service changes are because of a NYPD investigation at Jay St-MetroTech.

Expect delays on [R] and [Q] train service.
